description: Possible sizes of the torsion group of an elliptic curve over the rationals Q. This is a finite sequence.
references: Joseph H. Silverman, The Arithmetic of Elliptic Curves, Graduates texts in mathematics 106 Springer-Verlag.
links: Index entries for sequences related to groups
formula: Numbers n such that A221362(n) > 0. - _Jonathan Sondow_, May 10 2014
author: Noam Katz (noamkj(AT)hotmail.com), Feb 21 2001
